page.title: 09Industry South of Oakley-M3
page.content: {Kempshott Park Industrial Estate comprises four large modern factory units. The companies are: Wella Hair Care Products, Hugh Hall Business Equipment, Pickering & Inglis Christ- ian Book Publishers and Marshall, Morgan and Scott Publications. Nearby on the A30 is Mott's Motorcycle Repair Yard and shop selling spare parts. Near the motorway interchange is a large compound for{Motorway main- {tenance services.}Connected to the industrial estate by a single lane road bridge over the motorway is the old stable block of{Kempshott House converted into office accommodation and occupied by Milo. In{Pardown}there is a small industrial unit from which Baker's Coal Merchants, Baker's Heavy Breakdown Service and Tridonic operate.
